Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class InputHandler

      class InputHandler extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • jumpRequested
          boolean jumpRequested
          One-shot flag indicating a jump was requested.
        • keysPressed
          boolean[] keysPressed
          Array representing currently held movement keys.
          • index 0: move left (A)
          • index 1: move right (D)
          • index 2: jump (W)
          • index 3: unused / reserved
        • lastDirectionForwards
          boolean lastDirectionForwards
          Tracks the last horizontal movement direction for sprite facing.
        • restartRequested
          boolean restartRequested
          One-shot flag indicating a restart was requested.
        • shootRequested
          boolean shootRequested
          One-shot flag indicating a shoot action was requested.
